text: The 2004 PharmAssist Players' Championship was held March 31 - April 4 at the Mile One Stadium in St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador. The total purse for the event was $150,000 with $43,000 going to the winning team, which would be John Morris' Calgary rink.
